question: Stephen Wooldridge, the former world cycle champion has passed away. He hailed from which country?
explanation: Stephen Wooldridge (39), Australia\'s former Olympic and world cycle champion, has passed away in Australia on August 14, 2017. The former star team pursuiter won gold for Australia in the 2004 Athens Olympics, was also a four-time world champion in the discipline and the 2002 Commonwealth Games champion. There were no details about when and how Wooldridge died.
